Title: Smart Campus Energy Monitor
Description: Design a real-time energy monitoring system for college campuses using IoT sensors. The system should track consumption per floor/lab generate alerts for anomalies and provide a dashboard for facility managers to reduce wastage by at least 20%.

Title: AI-Based Attendance System
Description: Build a contactless AI-powered attendance system using facial recognition that works in varying lighting conditions. Should handle 500+ students per session integrate with existing ERPs and flag proxy attempts in real time.

Title: Open Source Contribution Tracker
Description: Create a GitHub-integrated dashboard that gamifies open source contributions for students. Track PRs issues code reviews and streak data. Include leaderboards badges and club-level analytics.

Title: Mental Health Peer Support Bot
Description: Develop an anonymous AI-driven peer support chatbot for students experiencing stress or burnout. Should detect crisis signals and escalate to human counsellors while maintaining strict data privacy compliance.

Title: Decentralised Voting Platform
Description: Build a tamper-proof digital voting platform using blockchain for college elections. Must support anonymous voting real-time result tallying audit trails and be accessible on low-bandwidth mobile connections.

Title: Hyperlocal Food Waste Reducer
Description: Create a platform connecting college canteens with NGOs and hostels to redistribute surplus food in real time. Include predictive demand forecasting to reduce over-preparation and generate monthly impact reports.

Title: AR-Based Lab Safety Trainer
Description: Design an augmented reality module that trains students on lab safety protocols before they enter physical labs. Include interactive hazard simulations quiz checkpoints and compliance certificates on completion.

Title: Accessible Learning Platform
Description: Build a learning management system specifically designed for students with visual auditory or motor disabilities. Must meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards support screen readers and provide AI-generated alt-text for all content.

Title: Campus Lost & Found Network
Description: Develop a geo-tagged lost and found platform for campus items with image recognition to match lost and found posts automatically. Include push notifications and a trust-based claim verification system.

Title: Real-Time Plagiarism Shield
Description: Create a plagiarism detection engine that compares submissions against the internet past submissions and peer work in real time. Should support code reports and presentations with an explainability layer for faculty.

Title: Student Startup Matchmaking Engine
Description: Build an AI matchmaking system that connects student founders with co-founders mentors and investors based on skills interests and idea stage. Include a pitch deck builder and milestone tracker.

Title: Smart Waste Segregation Bin
Description: Design a smart bin with computer vision that auto-segregates waste into dry wet and e-waste categories. Log data to a cloud dashboard showing fill levels segregation accuracy and collection schedules.

Title: Peer-to-Peer Skill Exchange
Description: Create a time-banking platform where students trade skills such as web development for guitar lessons. Include scheduling session logging rating systems and a credit economy managed by the institution.

Title: Supply Chain Transparency Tool
Description: Build a blockchain-backed tool for tracking the provenance of lab consumables and equipment purchases. Provide immutable audit logs vendor rating systems and automated red-flag alerts for procurement anomalies.

Title: Carbon Footprint Calculator
Description: Develop a tool that calculates the carbon footprint of a college campus by aggregating data from transport electricity water and waste sources. Generate personalised reduction recommendations and a public transparency dashboard.

Title: Smart Traffic Management System
Description: Design an AI-powered traffic management system for college campus roads that adapts signal timings based on real-time vehicle density. Reduce average wait times by 30% and integrate with emergency vehicle routing.

Title: Multilingual Lecture Summariser
Description: Build a tool that records live lectures and generates concise multilingual summaries in text and audio format. Support at least 5 Indian languages and allow students to ask follow-up questions on the summarised content.

Title: Gamified Coding Practice Platform
Description: Create a competitive coding platform with daily challenges leaderboards and XP-based progression. Include peer code review team battles and an AI hint system that guides without giving away the answer.

Title: Campus Carpooling App
Description: Develop a student carpooling application that matches commuters by route timing and preferences. Include a trust score system in-app payments carbon savings tracker and integration with college timetables.

Title: Automated Lab Inventory System
Description: Build an RFID and barcode-based lab inventory management system that tracks equipment usage availability and maintenance schedules. Send automated alerts for low stock calibration due dates and unauthorised access.
